a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual change in GDP, population and CO₂ emissions, World
Percentage change in gross domestic product (GDP), population, and carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions.
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024); Global Carbon Budget (2023)
Note: GDP figures are adjusted for inflation.
